title: GlobalStratotypeSection
description: A type of stratigraphic section used to define a globally agreed standard period of geologic time

geologicSetting.title: geologicSetting
geologicSetting.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">geologicSetting:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a description of the geologic setting of the stratigraphic section.

geologicDescription.title: geologicDescription
geologicDescription.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">geologicDescription:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a description of the geology of the stratigraphic section (e.g., lithology, paleontology, paleogeography, etc.).

accessibility.title: accessibility
accessibility.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">accessibility:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a description of the ability to access the stratigraphic section.

conservation.title: conservation
conservation.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">conservation:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a description of measures to conserve the stratigraphic section.
